text: private string GetConnectionString(string dbName, int timeout = 10) { StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); sb.Append($"Data Source={_ip};"); sb.Append($"User ID={_id};"); sb.Append($"Password={_password};"); sb.Append($"Initial Catalog={dbName};"); sb.Append($"Connect Timeout={timeout};"); sb.Append($"MultipleActiveResultSets=True;"); //sb.Append($"providerName=System.Data.SqlClient;"); return sb.ToString(); }
